com.entity.pc

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.entity.Entity
      • com.entity.GameCharacter
        • com.entity.pc.Player

  • public class Player
extends GameCharacter
    The character sheet of the player of the game. This tracks the player's health, mana, experience value, level, and attributes.
    Author:
    Christopher

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(PlayerClass playerClass)
      Initialises a player based on a specified player class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(PlayerClass playerClass)
        Initialises a player based on a specified player class. Initial stats will be set to 10* modifier value.
        Parameters:
        playerClass - RPG Class that the player has selected. Influences initial attributes and spell selection.

    • Method Detail

      • die

        public void die(Entity source)
        Function to be called when the player has no remaining health. Currently does nothing, but will be updated to reset the game later.
        Overrides:
        die in class Entity
        Parameters:
        source - entity which killed the player.

      • registerKill

        public void registerKill(Entity target)
        Registers killing off a target. If this target is an enemy, experience is awarded based on the xp value of the target.
        Overrides:
        registerKill in class Entity
        Parameters:
        target - target killed off.

      • gainXp

        public void gainXp(java.math.BigInteger amount)
        Increases the player's current xp score by the amount specified.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of xp to be added.

      • levelUp

        public void levelUp()
        Increases the player's level by 1, updating player attributes by 15-35% at random. Also resets the player's xp to 0, and increases xpToLevel by 25%.

      • getPlayerClass

        public PlayerClass getPlayerClass()
        Returns:
        The player class of the player.

      • getAttackDamage

        public java.math.BigInteger getAttackDamage()
        Overrides:
        getAttackDamage in class GameCharacter
        Returns:
        the attack damage of the player. This is equal to twice their Strength, plus any modifiers currently active.

      • getCurrentXP

        public java.math.BigInteger getCurrentXP()
        Returns:
        the current amount of xp gained since the previous level.

      • getXPToNextLevel

        public java.math.BigInteger getXPToNextLevel()
        Returns:
        the total xp needed to level up from 0 xp.
